desc: We are a self-care & lifestyle brand that believes everything & everyone has a purpose. Restore inner peace and balance with our long-lasting soy wax candles to be enjoyed daily. 10% of sales to be donated to neuro-related charities.

layout.text: We are a self-care and lifestyle brand, that promotes wellbeing and mindfulness. We help others take care of their minds, by bringing zen into their lives using our plant-based products. Each one of our collections has been researched & created to help you switch off from the daily stresses, aiding your wellbeing & soon getting a good night’s sleep!
